metadata.title: CVE-2017-0537 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the kernel USB gadget drivercould enable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-31614969.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2018-10-01').
